attributes.action: For Covid Restrictions and Rules to become temporary Laws.
attributes.background: To make the Covid rules and restrictions laws so the police can up hold them and they have full authority to arrest or fine those who break these laws and can force people to stay in their county if under quarantine or in a tier 3 or 4 setting.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Covid regulations are laws. You can find out more here: 

https://www.legislation.gov.uk/coronavirus
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
